port.desc: Port to bind the server to

rconport.desc: Port to bind the RCON to

owner.desc: The name of the owners account (e.g. Steam Username)

publicip.desc: Public IP Address of the Server (autodetect if empty)

rconpass.desc: The password of the RCON (random generate if empty)

encryption.desc: If network traffic shoud be encrypted (has to be disabled currently, wine support missing)

install.text:
#!/bin/bash

ConsolePort=$(grep '^ConsolePort=' ./Astro/Saved/Config/WindowsServer/AstroServerSettings.ini | tr -d '\r' | cut -d'=' -f2-)
ConsolePassword=$(grep '^ConsolePassword=' ./Astro/Saved/Config/WindowsServer/AstroServerSettings.ini | tr -d '\r' | cut -d'=' -f2-)
: ${ConsolePassword:?ConsolePassword missing} ${ConsolePort:=1234}

trap stop SIGHUP SIGINT SIGQUIT SIGTERM
stop() {
    kill $WATCHERPID
    connect
    echo "DSSaveGame" >&3
    echo "DSServerShutdown" >&3
    wait $SERVERPID
    kill -9 -$$
}
start() {
    echo "Starting Server"
    wineconsole ./Astro/Binaries/Win64/AstroServer-Win64-Shipping.exe Astro &
    SERVERPID=$!
    while sleep 1; do
        kill -0 $$ 2>/dev/null || wineserver -k
        grep '^State:[[:blank:]]Z' "/proc/$SERVERPID/status" >/dev/null 2>&1
        [[ $? == 1 ]] || kill -9 -$$
    done &
    WATCHERPID=$!
    echo "ServerPid: $SERVERPID | WatcherPid: $WATCHERPID"
}
connect() {
    disconnect
    while ! exec 3<>/dev/tcp/127.0.0.1/$ConsolePort; do
        sleep 1
    done
    echo "$ConsolePassword" >&3
    cat <&3 &
    CATPID=$!
}
disconnect() {
    test "$CATPID" && kill -9 $CATPID
    unset CATPID
    exec 3>&-
}
cmd() {
    while IFS= read -r line; do
        connect
        echo "$line" >&3
        while IFS= read -t 60 -r line; do
            echo "$line" >&3
        done
        disconnect
    done
}

start
sleep 5
cmd

exit 0

#!/bin/bash

PublicIP="$1"
test "$PublicIP" || PublicIP=$(host myip.opendns.com 208.67.220.222 | grep -oP '^myip\.opendns\.com.* \K(\d{1,3}\.){3}(\d{1,3})') #'
OwnerName="$2"
ConsolePort="${3:?ConsolePort required}"
ConsolePassword="$4"
test "$ConsolePassword" || ConsolePassword=$(cat /proc/sys/kernel/random/uuid)

cd "${0%/*}"

if [ -s AstroServerSettings.ini ]; then
sed -i "
s/^PublicIP=.*$/PublicIP=$PublicIP/
s/^OwnerName=.*$/OwnerName=$OwnerName/
s/^ConsolePort=.*$/ConsolePort=$ConsolePort/
s/^ConsolePassword=.*$/ConsolePassword=$ConsolePassword/
" AstroServerSettings.ini
else
cat <<EOD >AstroServerSettings.ini
[/Script/Astro.AstroServerSettings]
PublicIP=$PublicIP
OwnerName=$OwnerName
ConsolePort=$ConsolePort
ConsolePassword=$ConsolePassword
EOD
fi

exit 0
